Author: GivaCoin
Title: [ANN] GivaCoin GVC - Consumer Fundraising on Blockchain - Get Ready for Our ICO!
Body: GivaCoin GVC - Consumer Fundraising on Blockchain - Get Ready for Our ICO!  Introduction Donate to a worthy cause and get rewarded for it, consumer crowd fundraising on blockchain. GivaCoin is the next evolution in crowd fundraising to reach a global scale, with an emphasis on a rewards program that incentivizes our community of kind hearted donors. Through our platform, global donors will be able to make contributions to worthy causes through different forms of payment methods including credit card, PayPal, WeChat Pay, Alipay, as well as the two major crypto-currencies (Bitcoin and ETH)."  Link to our Whitepaper: https://www.givacoin.io/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/GivaCoin-Whitepaper-v1.0-ENG.pdf  Visit our Site: https://www.givacoin.io  About The Token  Total Allocation of 1 Billion Tokens to be created  An initial finite supply of GVC tokens will be created at the crowdsale, the allocation of these tokens will be used solely to reward donors for their contributions. Through daily business operations, whether donations comes in the form of various fiat currencies, btc, or eth, we will adjust the ratio between donations to GVC reward tokens. As different countries around the globe are beginning to create their own monetary backed crypto-currency, we will add these future payment methods to our platform as they reach scale.  The GVC tokens will function as the foundation within our rewards program. Donors will receive GVC tokens in return for their donations made to campaigns on our platform, which donors will be able to reuse these tokens for future donations or redeem the tokens for various gift products on our products page.  40% Public ICO 45% Our Reward Program 15% Founders and Company use   Initial Coin Offering TIME TO BE ANNOUNCED ONLY ON www.givacoin.io  Why ICO? In the current digital technology age, most crowd fundraising donations are made to campaigns with an outreach relative to the city/province/country where the campaign is started, almost all personal fundraising campaigns doesn't attract a global influence, we want to change this. Through GivaCoin, we are creating a system where campaign starters has the potential to reach a global audience of donors and where the donors have an incentive beyond helping the need of another.  We believe that we can democratize charity, but we need YOU to kickstart the movement. Thanks to you, we will be able to create a global network of leaders who will use GivaCoin in giving back to their communities and to help people that are desperately in need. Together, we will create a movement that will in the future recognize GivaCoin as a household name and a global leader in online fundraising.  Follow us at Facebook: www.facebook.com/GivaCoin Twitter: www.twitter.com/GivaCoin
